name: AVOID - THE BLOCKS ENDLESS BOUNCE GAME
name_original: AVOID - THE BLOCKS ENDLESS BOUNCE GAME
description:
Try to stay away from the RED and find your path way up pass the lines and earn points,
- Wait for the right time
- Tap the screen Left to go left right to go right
- Use the Objects to Climb up
Discover the adventure
How Far you can get, Share with friends, Enjoy the challenge
